description:
After the incident in the previous episode, Sota and Inami decide to work on curing her androphobia. To do so, they decide to walk home together. Along the way, they run into Sota`s younger sister, Nazuna, who becomes curious about their relationship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Moment of Truth, Nazuna Dons the Apron!?
疑惑の真相..., なずな働く.
